roleset.name: refill
roleset.note: REPLENISH-V NOTES: Member of Vncls fill-9.8. Checked by Julia, 10/2010. (from replenish.01-v)

roles.note: Be careful with the agent/substance distinction--reserve Arg0 only foractual (human) agents causing some (metaphorical) container to befilled with some (metaphorical) substance. (from replenish.01-v)

example.name: only container
example.text: The government moved aggressively to open the spigots of federal aid for victims of the California earthquake, but [its reservoir of emergency funds]-1 must be replenished *trace*-1 soon if the aid is to continue.
example.arg: if the aid is to continue

example.name: container and substance
example.text: [The disaster fund]-1 is replenished *trace*-1 by loan repayments.

example.name: (giggle)
example.text: Mary replenished her body's store of fat with nuts and berries after the long winter.
